description:
With the culture festival over and the world dyed in the Christmas mood, Shirogane recalled the kiss on the clock tower, desperately trying to understand Kaguya`s true intentions. Kaguya, on the other hand, gleefully told Hayasaka the events. However, the next day, a shrunken Kaguya appeared in the student council room for some reason. While everyone is concerned, a trial begins inside Kaguya`s brain!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Talk Things Over / Miko Iino Wants to Talk / About Kaguya Shinomiya, Part 3
Shriogane Miyuki wa Katariaitai / Iino Miko wa Kataritai / Shinomiya Kaguya ni Tsuite 3
白銀御行は語り合いたい / 伊井野ミコは語りたい / 四宮かぐやについて③
